description:
## Features
* Selection Tool, Frame Based Animation
* Emissive Area Lighting, Fog, Scattering
* Transparent voxels with Refraction and Attenuation
* Voxel Shader, Marching Cube Export

## Notes
If you saved your voxel art at default magicavoxel folder(needs admin permission). The folder path is here.
C:\ProgramData\chocolatey\lib\magicavoxel\tools\"previous-version-number"\vox (or \export folder)

I recommend use your home folder instead of above.
choco upgrade will not delete the previous version magicavoxel folder, but choco uninstall will delete all magicavoxel folder.

64bit only from 0.99.6.4 version.
summary: A free lightweight 8-bit voxel editor and interactive path tracing renderer.
author: ephtracy
